algorithm_technique: Iterate through string, track consecutive character counts, and store top 3 counts for each character.
problem_summary_simple: Find the longest substring of a single repeating character that appears at least three times.
problem_summary_technical: Groups consecutive identical characters. For each character, it tracks the lengths of its top three occurrences and checks if any length appears thrice.
key_insights: The problem focuses on 'special' substrings, which are sequences of a single repeating character.
We need to count how many times each special substring of a certain length appears.
The solution efficiently tracks the lengths of consecutive runs of each character and determines if any length occurs at least three times.
